sub_title: Experienced Transactional Lawyer: M&A, Cross-Border Transactions | Contract Management
summary:
Senior legal advisor specializing in corporate and M&A transactions (NL work permit)

Legal experience in international M&A projects, including full acquisitions, majority and minority investments, divestments and equity joint venture transactions, including:
-	legal due diligence and drafting various contracts (LOI, SPAs, SHAs, investment agreements, loan agreements, etc.) 
-	pro-actively engaging and managing outside counsel in multiple jurisdictions (Cyprus, BVI, UK, Germany, USA) 
-	coordinating approval of the transaction terms with the stakeholders through complex multi-party negotiations
-	assisting with closing and post-completion implementation. 

Clients included companies and investment funds from a number of industries, including finance, electronics, automotive, infrastructure, food and retail. 

Recent experience included development of legal exit and divestment strategies for multinational companies leaving the Russian market. 

Fluent English and Russian speaker. Authorized to work in the Netherlands. Open to work opportunities in the fields of M&A, cross-border transactions, contract management.

school.name: Northwestern University Pritzker School of Law
